org.apache.flink.storm.wrappers

类 WrapperSetupHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.storm.wrappers.WrapperSetupHelper

  • class WrapperSetupHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    WrapperSetupHelper is an helper class used by SpoutWrapper and BoltWrapper.

    • 方法详细资料

      • getNumberOfAttributes

        static java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Integer> getNumberOfAttributes(org.apache.storm.topology.IComponent spoutOrBolt,
                                                                                   java.util.Collection<java.lang.String> rawOutputs)
                                                                            throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
        Computes the number of output attributes used by a SpoutWrapper or BoltWrapper per declared output stream. The number is -1 for raw output type or a value within range [0;25] for output type Tuple0 to Tuple25.
        参数:
        spoutOrBolt - The Storm spout or bolt to be used.
        rawOutputs - Contains stream names if a single attribute output stream, should not be of type Tuple1 but be of a raw type. (Can be null.)
        返回:
        The number of attributes to be used for each stream.
        抛出:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - If rawOuput is true and the number of declared output attributes is not 1 or if rawOuput is false and the number of declared output attributes is not with range [0;25].

      • createTopologyContext

        static org.apache.storm.task.TopologyContext createTopologyContext(StreamingRuntimeContext context,
                                                                   org.apache.storm.topology.IComponent spoutOrBolt,
                                                                   java.lang.String operatorName,
                                                                   org.apache.storm.generated.StormTopology stormTopology,
                                                                   java.util.Map stormConfig)
        Creates a TopologyContext for a Spout or Bolt instance (ie, Flink task / Storm executor).
        参数:
        context - The Flink runtime context.
        spoutOrBolt - The Spout or Bolt this context is created for.
        stormTopology - The original Storm topology.
        stormConfig - The user provided configuration.
        返回:
        The created TopologyContext.

      • processSingleOperator

        private static java.lang.Integer processSingleOperator(java.lang.String componentId,
                                                       org.apache.storm.generated.ComponentCommon common,
                                                       java.lang.String operatorName,
                                                       int index,
                                                       int dop,
                                                       java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.String> taskToComponents,
                                                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.List<java.lang.Integer>> componentToSortedTasks,
                                                       java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.util.Map<java.lang.String,org.apache.storm.tuple.Fields>> componentToStreamToFields)
        Sets up taskToComponents, componentToSortedTasks, and componentToStreamToFields for a single instance of a Spout or Bolt (ie, task or executor). Furthermore, is computes the unique task-id.
        参数:
        componentId - The ID of the Spout/Bolt in the topology.
        common - The common operator object (that is all Spouts and Bolts have).
        operatorName - The Flink operator name.
        index - The index of the currently processed tasks with its operator.
        dop - The parallelism of the operator.
        taskToComponents - OUTPUT: A map from all task IDs of the topology to their component IDs.
        componentToSortedTasks - OUTPUT: A map from all component IDs to their sorted list of corresponding task IDs.
        componentToStreamToFields - OUTPUT: A map from all component IDs to there output streams and output fields.
        返回:
        A unique task ID if the currently processed Spout or Bolt (componentId) is equal to the current Flink operator operatorName -- null otherwise.
